mapper.select: SELECT dc.`material_id`, m.`material_name`, dc.`offline_progress`, dc.`online_progress` FROM `declaration` dc LEFT JOIN `material` m ON dc.`material_id` = m.`id` WHERE dc.`material_id` =#{materialId} AND dc.`user_id`=#{userId}

SELECT d.`material_id`, dp.`textbook_id`, tb.`textbook_name`,d.`user_id`, dp.`chosen_position`,dp.`rank`, tb.`is_chief_chosen`,tb.`is_published` FROM `dec_position` dp LEFT JOIN `declaration` d ON dp.`declaration_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `textbook` tb ON tb.`id`= dp.`textbook_id` LEFT JOIN `material` m ON tb.`material_id` = m.`id` WHERE d.`user_id`=#{userId} AND d.`material_id`=#{materialId}
SELECT * FROM user_message d WHERE d.`is_withdraw` =0 AND d.`is_deleted` =0 AND d.`receiver_id`=#{userId} AND d.`material_id`=#{materialId} ORDER BY d.`gmt_create` DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT * FROM `declaration` d WHERE d.`is_staging`=0 AND d.`user_id`=#{userId} AND d.`material_id`=#{materialId}
